short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FriendFlow enables you to make quality friends, track engagements, and close the loop on your relationships.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn your Facebook profile into a lead generation machine by leveraging the power of automated prospecting on Facebook.

FriendFlow for Chrome lets you find your ideal clients on Facebook and turn your Facebook friends into revenue.

★ Facebook Group Friending

With just one click, you’ll be able to send friend requests the members of any Facebook group and view them in FriendFlow where you can then add them or add them to an auto DM outreach campaign.

★ Smart Friending

Add 100s of your ideal clients in seconds on autopilot to save you time and ensure you’re only one added friend away from your next sale.

★ Smart Unfriending

Automatically find your least active friends and remove them all in one click to ensure that you only have room for the most engaged friends on Facebook who have the highest chance of becoming your next client.

★ Auto DM Outreach Automation

Send DM outreach campaigns to book sales calls, get clients, and turn your Facebook friends into revenue.  

★ AI Engagements

Get more engagement and reach from your Facebook profile by leveraging AI to like and comment on your friends’ posts automatically to save you time while being seen and boosting your content on the algorithm.

★ Trusted by 100s

FriendFlow is used by salespeople, marketers, recruiters, bloggers, reporters, and plenty of professionals who need to leverage the power of automated prospecting on Facebook.

★ Get Started

Install the FriendFlow Chrome extension and create a free account. You’ll get unlimited access to FriendFlow for free for 7 days and can upgrade your account for more.

By installing the extension, you agree to FriendFlow’s Privacy Policy (https://friendflow.io/privacy-policy). 

Any question? Drop us a line at hello@friendflow.io!
